name: mplrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: strov2rcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpl, c4)
stmt.pretty: strov2rcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpl, c4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c3, co(c2, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wrel(cdm(cmpl))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ c3 =(c2[mPoly]c4)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ Rel(dom(mPoly))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c3, co(c2, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wrel(cdm(cmpl))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ c3 =(c2[mPoly]c4)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ Rel(dom(mPoly))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c3, co(c2, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ c3 =(c2[mPoly]c4)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: Reverse closure for the polynomial index set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
